```{r}
library(ggplot2)

ggplot(dataset, aes(x = SaleDay, y = AVRatio)) + 
  geom_point(pch=17, color="blue", size=1) +
  geom_smooth(method="lm", color = "red", linetype = 1,se = 0.95) +
```
